item.title: How to Setup Cloud Init in Proxmoxve
item.description: How to setup cloud-init in prxmox ve Cloud-init can help us to deploy or change settings of linux virutal machine via api or manually by ourself. There are two ways to setup cloud-init: command line or change settings in GUI. Option 1: Download cloud-init image and setup with shell Please reference my blog Build Ubuntu 18.04 server with cloudinit support Option 2: Manually Setup cloud-init We can do this with 2 steps.
